resources.string: The application needs to have access to a valid Google Account because it uses its Google Calendar to store data from CTU timetable.
The application uses CTU timetable and Google Calendar. You have to be logged into a CTU account and a Google account.
The application needs these permissions to store data from CTU timetable in a Google Calendar.\nThe application cannot work without these permissions.
%1$s Open the app settings screen to modify the app permissions.
